title: Subnet routers: how do they work?
summary: Subnet routers are a powerful tool to bring Tailscale to environments where you can't install the client on every device.  In today's video, Alex explains how subnet routers work and shows the steps to configure one on Windows and Linux

title: Slash Pages
summary:
In the spirit of so many doing Slash pages, I thought to share my version of a 404 page with you all. 

I'm sorry, but our team of highly trained space monkeys cannot seem to find what it is you are looking for. 
It could be because:

You need to take your spacesuit gloves off when typing in the link...
